page.title: 02THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 1
page.content: Approximately 2000 people live in the Marks Tey area. From our sample of 200 people we found most people live here because there are good road and rail links to wherever they want to go _ their place of employment, London, Colchester etc. The majority of people like the area and the house prices suited them. Only 4% have lived in Marks Tey all their lives, 27% have lived here 0-5 years and the largest number (35%) 6-10 years. I have known 21 people who have left this school and 23 who have come. {HOUSING}Most houses are modern and were built in the last 20 years. My house is 14 years old. 92% of the people are house owners and 77% live on our large estate. 51%live in detached houses and 43% in semi - detached. Only 10 people live in terraced houses. The majority have 4
